content.rendered:
Directed by Sunny Deol.

Written by Sagar Pandya. Sanjay Masoomm. Vishal Vijay Kumar. Vishal Vijay Kumar. Nitesh V. Ranglani.

Cast Sunny Deol(Ajay Mehra). Soha Ali Khan(Rhea). Om Puri(ACP Joe D’Souza). Aanchal Munjal(Anushka (as Aachal Munjal)). Narendra Jha(Raj Bansal). Ramesh Deo(Nana). Tisca Chopra(Sheetal Bansal). Harsh Chhaya(Rajguru). Nadira Babbar(Dadi). Rishabh Arora(Varun). Ruhanika Dhawan(Ananya Bansal). Zakir Hussain(Commissioner). Sebastien Vandenberghe(Troy). Neha Khan(Renu). Sachin Khedekar(Kriplani). Nina Kulkarni(Mrs. Joe D’Souza). Abhilash Kumar(Bansal Kabir (as Kumar Abhilash)). Lily Patel(Varun’s Grandmother). Diana Khan(Zoya). Shivam Patil(Rohan). Satyajeet Puri(Ajay Mehra’s Friend (as Satyajeet)). Akshay Singh(Akshay). Raymon Singh(Mrs. Kriplani (Rohan’s Mother)) . Ashutosh Aaryan(Ravi house Staff).Roselin Sonia Gomes. Lakshya Handa(Vicky Oberoi). Anisha Hinduja(Zoya’s Mother). Prashannt Jha(Extras). Manoj Joshi(Home Minister Kaka Saheb). Mamta Kapoor(Mamta Kapoor). Neena Kulkarni(Mrs. Joe Dsouza). Jackey Mishra(Jack). Sushant Sharma(Arjun (Hacker)). Sushant Sharma(Arjun (Hacker)). Suchint Singh(Suchint). Lokesh Tilakdhari(Lokesh). Ashish Tiwari(Trinentra Tiwari – Hacker). Navdeep Tomar(Bansal’s Henchmen). Ajay Upadhyay(Press reporter). Ajay Upadhyay(Press riporter). Rajeev Vashishth(Bansal’s friend (credit only)). Reyna Vashishtha(Office Hacker)

Language Hindi.

Producers Jay Dev Banerjee. Dharmendra. Ronak Motla. Suniel S. Saini. Sunil Sharma. Ravinder Thakur.

Production Vijayta Films.
